main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio, on February 27, 1958.
interesting points: The object was silver in color and had a bright glow., The object was traveling at tremendous speeds in a westerly direction., The sighting lasted between 1.5 to 2 minutes., There were multiple reliable sources that reported the sighting., The shape of the object was described as cigar-like.
sighted object: a silver-colored cigar-like object with a bright glow
witness description: multiple reliable sources, but specific witnesses not identified
